div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 852 Radoslavovo, Mirkov district, Bul- garia, 1934 Burial: c. 280 B.C.? (T) Contents: 31 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 3 dr. Imit. Alexander III: 18 tetradr. Philip III: 8 tetradr. Lysimachus: 2 dr. Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 11 (1937), p. 316
